description: Gets the configuration settings for a media insights pipeline.

parameters.name: Identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the requested resource. Valid values include the name and ARN of the media insights pipeline configuration.

nested_items.name: MediaInsightsPipelineConfiguration
nested_items.description: The requested media insights pipeline configuration.

nested_items.name: MediaInsightsPipelineConfigurationName
nested_items.description: The name of the configuration.

nested_items.name: MediaInsightsPipelineConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the configuration.

nested_items.name: ResourceAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role used by the service to access Amazon Web Services resources.

nested_items.name: RealTimeAlertConfiguration
nested_items.description: Lists the rules that trigger a real-time alert.

nested_items.name: Disabled
nested_items.description: Turns off real-time alerts.

nested_items.name: Rules
nested_items.description: The rules in the alert. Rules specify the words or phrases that you want to be notified about.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of alert rule.

nested_items.name: KeywordMatchConfiguration
nested_items.description: Specifies the settings for matching the keywords in a real-time alert rule.

nested_items.name: RuleName
nested_items.description: The name of the keyword match rule.

nested_items.name: Keywords
nested_items.description: The keywords or phrases that you want to match.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Negate
nested_items.description: Matches keywords or phrases on their presence or absence. If set to TRUE, the rule matches when all the specified keywords or phrases are absent. Default: FALSE.

nested_items.name: SentimentConfiguration
nested_items.description: Specifies the settings for predicting sentiment in a real-time alert rule.

nested_items.name: RuleName
nested_items.description: The name of the rule in the sentiment configuration.

nested_items.name: SentimentType
nested_items.description: The type of sentiment, POSITIVE, NEGATIVE, or NEUTRAL.

nested_items.name: TimePeriod
nested_items.description: Specifies the analysis interval.

nested_items.name: IssueDetectionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Specifies the issue detection settings for a real-time alert rule.

nested_items.name: RuleName
nested_items.description: The name of the issue detection rule.

nested_items.name: Elements
nested_items.description: The elements in the configuration.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The element type.

nested_items.name: AmazonTranscribeCallAnalyticsProcessorConfiguration
nested_items.description: The analytics configuration settings for transcribing audio in a media insights pipeline configuration element.

nested_items.name: LanguageCode
nested_items.description: The language code in the configuration.

nested_items.name: VocabularyName
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the custom vocabulary to use when processing a transcription. Note that vocabulary names are case sensitive.

nested_items.name: VocabularyFilterName
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the custom vocabulary filter to use when processing a transcription. Note that vocabulary filter names are case sensitive.

nested_items.name: VocabularyFilterMethod
nested_items.description: Specifies how to apply a vocabulary filter to a transcript.

nested_items.name: LanguageModelName
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the custom language model to use when processing a transcription. Note that language model names are case sensitive.

nested_items.name: EnablePartialResultsStabilization
nested_items.description: Enables partial result stabilization for your transcription. Partial result stabilization can reduce latency in your output, but may impact accuracy. For more information, see Partial-result stabilization in the Amazon Transcribe Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: PartialResultsStability
nested_items.description: Specifies the level of stability to use when you enable partial results stabilization ( EnablePartialResultsStabilization).

nested_items.name: ContentIdentificationType
nested_items.description: Labels all personally identifiable information (PII) identified in your transcript.

nested_items.name: ContentRedactionType
nested_items.description: Redacts all personally identifiable information (PII) identified in your transcript.

nested_items.name: PiiEntityTypes
nested_items.description: Specifies the types of personally identifiable information (PII) to redact from a transcript. You can include as many types as you'd like, or you can select ALL.

nested_items.name: FilterPartialResults
nested_items.description: If true, UtteranceEvents with IsPartial: true are filtered out of the insights target.

nested_items.name: PostCallAnalyticsSettings
nested_items.description: The settings for a post-call analysis task in an analytics configuration.

nested_items.name: OutputLocation
nested_items.description: The URL of the Amazon S3 bucket that contains the post-call data.

nested_items.name: DataAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role used by Amazon Web Services Transcribe to upload your post call analysis. For more information, see Post-call analytics with real-time transcriptions in the Amazon Transcribe Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: ContentRedactionOutput
nested_items.description: The content redaction output settings for a post-call analysis task.

nested_items.name: OutputEncryptionKMSKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the KMS (Key Management Service) key used to encrypt the output.

nested_items.name: CallAnalyticsStreamCategories
nested_items.description: By default, all CategoryEvents are sent to the insights target. If this parameter is specified, only included categories are sent to the insights target.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AmazonTranscribeProcessorConfiguration
nested_items.description: The transcription processor configuration settings in a media insights pipeline configuration element.

nested_items.name: LanguageCode
nested_items.description: The language code that represents the language spoken in your audio.

nested_items.name: VocabularyName
nested_items.description: The name of the custom vocabulary that you specified in your Call Analytics request.

nested_items.name: VocabularyFilterName
nested_items.description: The name of the custom vocabulary filter that you specified in your Call Analytics request.

nested_items.name: VocabularyFilterMethod
nested_items.description: The vocabulary filtering method used in your Call Analytics transcription.

nested_items.name: ShowSpeakerLabel
nested_items.description: Enables speaker partitioning (diarization) in your transcription output. Speaker partitioning labels the speech from individual speakers in your media file.

nested_items.name: EnablePartialResultsStabilization
nested_items.description: Enables partial result stabilization for your transcription. Partial result stabilization can reduce latency in your output, but may impact accuracy.

nested_items.name: PartialResultsStability
nested_items.description: The level of stability to use when you enable partial results stabilization ( EnablePartialResultsStabilization).

nested_items.name: ContentIdentificationType
nested_items.description: Labels all personally identifiable information (PII) identified in your transcript.

nested_items.name: ContentRedactionType
nested_items.description: Redacts all personally identifiable information (PII) identified in your transcript.

nested_items.name: PiiEntityTypes
nested_items.description: The types of personally identifiable information (PII) to redact from a transcript. You can include as many types as you'd like, or you can select ALL.

nested_items.name: LanguageModelName
nested_items.description: The name of the custom language model that you want to use when processing your transcription. Note that language model names are case sensitive.

nested_items.name: FilterPartialResults
nested_items.description: If true, TranscriptEvents with IsPartial: true are filtered out of the insights target.

nested_items.name: IdentifyLanguage
nested_items.description: Turns language identification on or off.

nested_items.name: IdentifyMultipleLanguages
nested_items.description: Turns language identification on or off for multiple languages.

nested_items.name: LanguageOptions
nested_items.description: The language options for the transcription, such as automatic language detection.

nested_items.name: PreferredLanguage
nested_items.description: The preferred language for the transcription.

nested_items.name: VocabularyNames
nested_items.description: The names of the custom vocabulary or vocabularies used during transcription.

nested_items.name: VocabularyFilterNames
nested_items.description: The names of the custom vocabulary filter or filters using during transcription.

nested_items.name: KinesisDataStreamSinkConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration settings for the Kinesis Data Stream Sink in a media insights pipeline configuration element.

nested_items.name: InsightsTarget
nested_items.description: The ARN of the sink.

nested_items.name: S3RecordingSinkConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration settings for the Amazon S3 recording bucket in a media insights pipeline configuration element.

nested_items.name: Destination
nested_items.description: The default URI of the Amazon S3 bucket used as the recording sink.

nested_items.name: RecordingFileFormat
nested_items.description: The default file format for the media files sent to the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: VoiceAnalyticsProcessorConfiguration
nested_items.description: The voice analytics configuration settings in a media insights pipeline configuration element.

nested_items.name: SpeakerSearchStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the speaker search task.

nested_items.name: VoiceToneAnalysisStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the voice tone analysis task.

nested_items.name: LambdaFunctionSinkConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration settings for the Amazon Web Services Lambda sink in a media insights pipeline configuration element.

nested_items.name: InsightsTarget
nested_items.description: The ARN of the sink.

nested_items.name: SqsQueueSinkConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration settings for an SQS queue sink in a media insights pipeline configuration element.

nested_items.name: InsightsTarget
nested_items.description: The ARN of the SQS sink.

nested_items.name: SnsTopicSinkConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration settings for an SNS topic sink in a media insights pipeline configuration element.

nested_items.name: InsightsTarget
nested_items.description: The ARN of the SNS sink.

nested_items.name: VoiceEnhancementSinkConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration settings for voice enhancement sink in a media insights pipeline configuration element.

nested_items.name: Disabled
nested_items.description: Disables the VoiceEnhancementSinkConfiguration element.

nested_items.name: MediaInsightsPipelineConfigurationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the configuration.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the configuration was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the configuration was last updated.
